descriptionNullable:
This Kaggle dataset is derived from the widely used FER2013 dataset, a facial emotion recognition benchmark, where each emotion, excluding neutral, is categorized into four distinct intensity levels (25%, 50%, 75%, and 100%).
**Source Dataset**: FER2013
**Task**: Emotion Classification with 4 intensity levels
**Classes**:
- 25% Intensity
- 50% Intensity
- 75% Intensity
- 100% Intensity

**Statistics**:
Angry: 25%-363, 50%-1381, 75%-1542, 100%-1607
Disgust: 25%-75, 50%-133, 75%-234, 100%-105
Fear: 25%-1223, 50%-1563, 75%-705, 100%-1135
Happy: 25%-1189, 50%-1280, 75%-2235, 100%-1584
Sad: 25%-2262, 50%-1173, 75%-371, 100%-692
Surprise: 25%-1722, 50%-284, 75%-679, 100%-1317

Contributors: @gudelakshmi, @laalasakrishna
title: Face-Emotion-Level-Recognition
